body:
Is there a continuation of this doujin?
Must find it 
Its so goddamn good

Same. I can't help but think that a lot of these doujins twisted. C.C. is complete gangbang material considering the number of fans she has. Not to mention that her power when she had Geass was to make people fall in love with her so it would have been interesting to see how that played out. And her personality is probably the best for gangbang as well, but I keeping seeing her getting put in some soft shit that seems a little awkward or forced for her character. Alternatively I'm down for the soft Kallen/Lelouch, but there is so little of compared to C.C. they mainly put her in gangbang shit for some reason, kinda wish it was switched. I really like the threesomes with those 3 characters as well. Those are top tier.
No comments for this one? Unacceptable! This has some great art, and it's one of the few gang-bang hentai out there that is willing. Loved CC in this.
